document.full_text: fist fights and fraud marred nigeria's final state governorship election friday, a re-run of a vote which was declared inconclusive last month because of widespread irregularities.
document.title: fraud and fights mar final nigerian state election
lines_and_colors: fist fights and fraud marred nigeria's final state governorship election friday, a re-run of a vote which was declared inconclusive last month because of widespread irregularities.
